original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2306)@ 在武將四周，召喚12隻<color=#4cc769>巨木樹妖</color>協助作戰。 <color=#4cc769>巨木樹妖</color>屬性： <color=#FFE787>體力值：</color>$Soldier_HP(1296)@ 武力值：$Soldier_Str(1296)@
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2306)@ Around the generals, summon 12 <color=#4cc769>Giant Tree Tree Demons</color> to assist in the battle. <color=#4cc769>Giant Wood Dryad</color> Attribute:  <color=#FFE787>Stamina value: </color>$Soldier_HP(1296)@ Force value:  $Soldier_Str(1296)@
